TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableRowsCollectionEditor extends System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for editing rows of a table.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> to associate the `TableRowsCollectionEditor` class and the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> class (the collection editor's base class) with a custom `TestRows` property.
[!CODE [Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples#2](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of the collection to edit.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableRowsCollectionEditor"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool CanSelectMultipleInstances() cil managed

Docs.summary: Indicates whether multiple instances may be selected.
Docs.returns: `true` if multiple items can be selected at once; otherwise, `false`. This implementation always returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance object CreateInstance(class System.Type itemType) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Type"> of the item to create.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the specified type.
Docs.returns: An object of the specified type.
